text: Pablo Casado Blanco (born 1 February 1981) is a Spanish politician. He was the leader of the People's Party. He was one of the three deputies for √Åvila in the national Congress of Deputies from 2011 until 2022. From 2015 to 2018 he also was Vice Secretary-General of Communication of the People's Party (PP). In July 2018, he became the president of the PP. He resigned in April 2022. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish politicians
title: Pablo Casado
